combat-friend-death: This is so sad, can we hit 50 likes?

combat-kill: Can't suppress 65 million years of gut instinct.
combat-friend-death: Now all my friends are dead!
cannibal-self: I'm way past my experation date
victory: We win this round to fight another
It take an asteriod to kill me!

combat-self-death: Ashes to ashes, dirt to dirt...
I want to be reincarnated as something else
combat-friend-death: She was my best friend, after ant #4...
cannibal-self: I'm way past my expiration date!
Are you really going to eat a worm? Gross.
victory: It take an asteriod to kill me!

combat-kill: Now stay dead or you'll get detention
combat-self-death: 5 paragraph essay on my life, due tomorrow.
You're going to see the principle mister!
combat-friend-death: I think you need a hall pass for that...
We have a zero tolerance policy for bullying!
cannibal-self: I was expecting a thank you card!
I knew we shouldn't have read 'Lord of the Flies'...
cannibal-other: Best school lunch I've had in a while
There goes my teacher of the year award...
Just like in 'Lord of the Flies'!
victory: Everyone put a gold star next to your names!

combat-self-death: The sun must not set on my Empire...
combat-friend-death: They got spotted in the red...
cannibal-self: What do you mean 'Eat the Rich'??'
cannibal-other: Recycling is important, even for royalty.
We all must sacrifice for the realm... (some more than others)

cannibal-self: Oh, I DO look like a snack!
